tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,
review:
I recently got my wisdom teeth removed and also underwent a root canal procedure. I was really anxious about the process and the pain. Dr. Rajesh and his team were extremely friendly and made me super comfortable during the procedure. I did not experience any discomfort during the procedure. He patiently cleared all my queries.

The ambience is very hygienic. Follow-ups post-procedure made me more confident on the path to recovery. Furthermore, my mother underwent a tooth extraction procedure, and she is doing well now. Thank you so much, Dr.Rajesh.
Overall, great and exceptional service.

I would highly recommend Thangam's dental clinic!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Doctor on 13th March 2024. The capping-built like a bridge, done 3 decades ago,  of late kept coming off.  Eager to get it set right, concerned at the same time  of what will this involve, cost and time involved. Having a 2+ month baby at home, these concerns were prominent. Went with my Spouse. We found the following as huge Plus Points:                               
 1) wait time: was Zero. We were attended on the time of Appointment.
2) Friendliness: Doctor has a way of engaging. Enquires about the  family,  small talk, listens with attention.  All these facilitate the Patient to relax and get ready for the process  that will be next.  
3)  Explanation of the issues: Doctor explained the material used for capping will have to change. Made a fix with a resin that will hold on for few months to come. 
4) Value gained:  I do not know what the Doctor gained.... but grateful the way he understands the concerns unspoken and billed in a way that the temporary setting will pull through the period. The cost was very minimal. Also, shared the aspects, that need to be attended as soon as possible.  Our Best Wishes to Doctor and his Family... 
Kudos to Thangam Clinic!
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

review: It was an amazing experience,  was painless,  explanations were complete and to the point, what to expect clarified, appointment schedule was met, great value. An incredible experience.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Crowns,
review: I am very happy with the treatment.  I went with multiple problems caused due to an earlier RCT by a different Dentist.  I had severe infection.  But Dr Rajesh Kumar has patiently attended to all my problems and saved maximum number of teeth.  He understands patient's condition ver well and perfect in his execution...be it RCT, or dental crown /bridge fixing etc.  I highly recommend Dr Rajesh Kumar for any dental problem.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Ceramic Facing Crown,Dental Deep Cleaning, Teeth cleaning & polishing,RCT - Single Sitting,
review: Thankyou Dr. Rajesh and staff for the excellent dental care given to me and my husband and for keeping it a painless experience. We were on holiday in India for a short time and were well accommodated with appointments. Your knowledge in your field, professional expertise, 26 years of experience, all this counts a lot and is highly appreciated by us...being on the other side of the "drill" and that's what makes a dentist trustworthy. I am a person who is very anxious of doctors, clinics, and hospitals but I never need to stress when I am in your care. You are my all-time go-to dentist if ever need be.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rajesh and Dr. Sripal explained the whole procedure thoroughly and helped me relax. I was very apprehensive about the injections (for the local anesthesia) but was very relieved when it turned out to be less of an issue.
The extraction was swift and painless. Dr. Sripal explained what he had done thoroughly. Both doctors and staff went though post-extraction care exhaustively.
I am very happy about the whole process and wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Rajesh and Dr. Sripal for their expertise and care. In addition, I thank the staff for their follow up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Experienced, *************,diagnosed the issue by talking to the patients politely,and explained the problem in a easily understand able language and it's treatment 
Took his time to check the patient clinically 
And I'm happy that doctor has explained to my mother in empathetic way
My mom was super scared about surgery and now she is confident now and that's what a doctor should give to patients .thanks a lot for ur service especially during this pandemic times , cleanliness of the clinic is so good and well maintained.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: I have undergone couple of complex extractions , root canal and recently dental implants with Dr Rajesh. My experience with the doctor is truly satisfied and overwhelmed with the way they care for the patients. Not just the treatment is phenomenal but also the advice or suggestions for the overall health which I have never seen with any other doctors.  He is very friendly, approachable and most importantly,  they explain what,how they are doing the procedures. At this time, I would also like to extend my thanks to Dr Sripal who has the same quality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe pain in my tooth and when I searched the Web for dentist in Mylapore, I came across Thangam dental clinic and when I dropped in I was informed that the doctor is not in town but I was told by the lady who was available that she will examine if it is emergency which I obliged.  I was given few tablets and advised to meet the doctor on Monday.. I went to his clinic met him had myself examined and the doctor was very friendly and courteous. Never thought my pain would come to a stop in one day  and now I am relived of my pain.  Very Conservative and I will recommend Dr Rajesh Kumar to all my friends and family....

review:
I had been looking for Orthodontic treatment for long time, have looked at dentist around Pune, Chennai and found finally found Dr Rajesh who handled the process immaculately. 
Dr Rajesh was very clear with the line and time duration for the treatment. As the dental condition was complex with common course of action being mandibular surgery. Dr suggested and implemented non-surgical orthodontic treatment which has corrected jaw alignment and also the facial aesthetics. 

Dr is very ******** experienced and enjoys working on challenging cases. I do recommend Dr for dental treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for the feedback

tags: None
review:
I was very happy when I went to Thangam Clinic. Good ambience. Doctor is very kind and hospitable. I did not wait at all. As per appointment I was attended.No waste of time.The doctor takes the complete medical history and medication meticulously,before going into the diagnosis. Doctor gives a patient hearing .His advises before and after the procedure very good.During the procedure he treats the patient with extra care to make the patient feel at home.  In my case I did not feel any pain during the procedure.The follow up by the doctor after treatment is commendable.He has a good set of assistants. Even though I  am far from the clinic ,despite being old I still like to visit Thangam clinic  for any tooth problem.you go with pain and return with no pain. I have no hesitation in recommending Dr. Rajesh Kumaar.      for any dental problem.


God's Blessings  to everyone.

Inline image 1

Rajesh for making my son smile been with joy and confident young man. I sincerely thank god for introducing me to you

Happy smiling mother






T

review: Doctor is friendly, quick and perfect. I had root canal treatment for one tooth under one dentist. It was going on for. One and half years. Then the doctor fell sick and i had to find out another doctor. I came to. Dr. Rajeshkumar. During my first visit itself measurement was taken. I was surprised. During my next visit my tooth is fixed. Now i am alright. During my visit the doctor was friendly and i was comfortable. Thank you.  L akshmi devi

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: The deep set fear of the dentist is laid to rest with Dr. Rajesh Kumar. All the treatment that I have gone through so far has never caused me any pain. His ability to put one at ease and help with one's breathing has done much to relax the mind and body. All this inspite of the fact that I am diabetic and have rhumotoid arthritis. The healing time is no longer than any other person I think. To follow his advice after the procedure is helpful. He is one of a kind. Thank you doctor

review:
Dr Rajesh was amazingly patient and kind. He was totally professional and recreated 6 new teeth in my mouth with great precision and supreme craftsmanship. Extensive root canal work was done almost painlessly. The new bridges/crowns were fitted with precision I have not previously experienced in many years of dentistry. I am thoroughly satisfied and cannot recommend Dr Kumar highly enough.
At all times giving full explanations and answering all questions to the point of indulgence. A great man and a great artist in dentistry.
I cannot recommend him highly enough.
